import React from 'react'; export default function ControlPanel({ systemHealth }) { return (

System Health

Total Grids

{systemHealth.total_grids || 0}

Online Grids

{systemHealth.online_grids || 0}

Total People

Critical Alerts

{systemHealth.critical_alerts || 0}

); }
